static_fields.name: Buy Windows Midsize Hakose Urushi | Minase | Made in Japan
static_fields.description: Windows midsize Hakose is handmade in Japan. Hakose uses urushi lacquer, paint and metal powder (makie) to decorate the dials.

hasVariant.name: Windows Midsize Hakose Gold
hasVariant.description: Minase aims at celebrating traditional crafts and techniques from Japan and partners with famous urushi master Junichi Hakose for this edition. Hakose’s urushi makie dials are fitted in the Windows model and pay tribute to Japanese nature. Each timepiece comes with its own Certificate of Authenticity and packed in a hand-made wooden box, wrapped in Minase furoshiki.
